titlestmt.titleproper: Commonwealth Fund records, James Picker Foundation, SG 1, Series 35
A Guide to the Commonwealth Fund records, James Picker Foundation, SG 1, Series 35 FA309

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-09-02 19:52:01 -0400.

did.unittitle: Commonwealth Fund records, James Picker Foundation, SG 1, Series 35

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The Commonwealth Fund collection was donated to the RAC in 1985. Records in this series were transferred to the RAC by Commonwealth Fund in 1986, as a portion of Accession 1986:069.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: RAC has legal title, copyright and literary rights to the material in so far it holds them. RAC may grant permission to publish.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains documentation of annual meetings, board of directors and special meetings, grants, fellowships, scholarships, sabbaticals, accepted and rejected proposals, finacial reports and correspondence.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php
